Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $180. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing top-tier solutions to our valued customers like yourself. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
